titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-02 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 2, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Don Slayman, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
